data.eml:eml: Description of four new species in the bee genus Melitta Kirby, 1802 (Hymenoptera: Melittidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Michez, Denis, Kuhlmann, Michael, Ivanov, Sergey P., Radchenko, Vladimir G. (2012): Description of four new species in the bee genus Melitta Kirby, 1802 (Hymenoptera: Melittidae). Zootaxa 3337: 57-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281347
